fields.name: BgpAdvertisements
fields.description: The association of IP address pools to the communities and peers, allowing for announcement of IPs.

fields.name: BgpPeers
fields.description: The list of additional BgpPeer entities that the Kubernetes cluster will peer with. All peering must be explicitly defined.

fields.name: FabricPeeringEnabled
fields.description: The indicator to specify if the load balancer peers with the network fabric.

fields.name: IPAddressPools
fields.description: The list of pools of IP addresses that can be allocated to Load Balancer services.
